item.body: The name Godrej has been synonymous with security solutions in the country. The company, which manufactured its first lock in 1897, is exhibiting its legacy products that were created a century ago for its employees as part of its annual foundation day celebrations that started on May 7. The exhibits vary from the oldest vintage lock to a mammoth safe weighing over 500 kg and the first-ever voting ballot box. There will also be an array of classic locks on display. This will give Godrej employees a glimpse into the past allowing them to witness the brand's journey. "I joined this company two years ago and am still discovering such stuff. All through this journey, durability and innovation have remained common," says Shireesh Joshi, chief operating officer, strategic marketing head, Godrej Group. The group is also showcasing its journey through a mobile van — Innovation Express.
